dmca.title: Trademark Infriengement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Sharon Gaffney [mailto:sgaffney@LetsMeetOut.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, August 09, 2006 11:55 AM
Posted To: Microsoft Office Outlook Embedded Message
Conversation: Trademark Infriengement
Subject: Trademark Infriengement
Importance: High


Dear Anthony,
 
I notified you last week that one of your hosting clients is infringing
on my company's trademark.  Our trademark serial number is 78/295167.
In addition, this site is using graphics licensed by us for which they
do not have permission to use as well as graphics that we created
in-house.  The content or complete site should be removed immediately or
we will be forced to take legal action against theplanet.com since you
have been notified that your client is infringing on the trademark.
 
Below are the URLs where our trademark can be found:
 
http://70.86.9.114/%7eworld/member_register.php
 
http://70.86.9.114/%7eworld/index.php
 
http://70.86.9.114/%7eworld/meetoutareas.php
 
Please have this content removed, or the site turned off completely.
 
Regards,
 
Sharon Gaffney
Co-Founder
 
 <http://www.letsmeetout.com/stg/lmo_logo2005.gif> 
Sharon Gaffney
sgaffney@LetsMeetOut.com
Tel: 646.536.3633
Fax: 646.619.4407
LetsMeetOut.com <http://www.letsmeetout.com/>
